nodes.text: The father of Rebel Alliance starfighter pilot Tarrin Datch was a Human male. Datch also had brothers, one sister, and a mother. The Datch parents were the proprietors of Pellezara station, in the Duro system.

Tarrin's father once grounded his son for three weeks, literally, assigning him to work in traffic control and resupply, after attempting a miniature Koiogran turn in a bulk freighter that destroyed a dozen beacon pods in the process.
In 1 ABY, Tarrin joined the Rebel Alliance. Although he missed his family, he knew better than to involve them in the Galactic Civil War, for their safety.
